stimulusHtml: In a one-dimensional perfectly elastic collision, an object of mass m is traveling with speed v0 in the +x-direction when it strikes an object with mass 3m that is at rest. What are the objectsâ€™ velocities following the collision?
choicesHtml:
Object of Mass m Object of Mass 3m
Zero v0/3, +x-direction

 

Object of Mass m Object of Mass 3m
v0/4, +x-direction v0/2, +x-direction
Object of Mass m Object of Mass 3m
v0/2, +x-direction v0/2, +x-direction
Object of Mass m Object of Mass 3m
v0/2, -x-direction v0/2, +x-direction
